Key Match Events: Oneil Cruz dived for a line drive from Adam Frazier which resulted in Frazier getting a leadoff triple.
Maikel Garcia scored on a double by Bobby Witt Jr. after Frazier's triple.
Bobby Witt Jr. hit a fly ball that deflected off Oneil Cruz's glove for an RBI double.
Pre-Game Insights: Manager Derek Shelton acknowledged that there will be bumps in the road for Oneil Cruz in center field.
Post-Match Reflections: Derek Shelton stated that these situations are where Cruz needs to learn and continue to be coached and taught.
